r.d: This package provides PDF generation using only PHP, without requiring any external libraries.
r.n: * Preserve font settings when adding new pages (Bug #2682). * Add setFontStyle() method (d.baechtold@unico.ch, Request #5230). * Allow all coordinates to be specified as negative values from the right or bottom edges (Request #5230). * Add setTextColor() to specify text colors different from fill colors (Request #1767).
